version_description:
Thanks for using the 2GB app. To make our app better for you, we aim to bring regular updates to the App Store.

If you have iOS 7 and up, you can update the app automatically by going to Settings > iTunes & App Store > Automatic Downloads and turning on Updates.
- Fixed an issue where the feedback Send and Cancel buttons were hard to read
- Fixed an incompatibility issue on devices running iOS 7 only
Improved front end details and station description.

• Fixed article formatting display issues
• Fixed social media link issues
• Performance improvement
• Optimised display for iPhone X
Bug fix: automatically resume stream audio after the phone call ends
Fixed interstitial ad display issue during app start
